mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_ID, P.CATE_ID, PC.MIDDLE_NM, PC.SMALL_NM, P.PROD_NM, P.MODEL_NM, P.BRND_ID, B.BRND_NM, P.PRICE, P.DC_PER, P.REP_IMG, P.SALE_STUS, P.SALE_ST_DTTM, P.SALE_ED_DTTM, P.DC_ST_DTTM, P.DC_ED_DTTM, P.REG_DTTM, P.REGR_ID, P.DEL_YN FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PROD_CATE PC ON P.CATE_ID=PC.CATE_ID JOIN BRAND B ON P.BRND_ID = B.BRND_ID WHERE SALE_STUS=601 AND P.DEL_YN='N' AND (PC.MIDDLE_NM, PC.SMALL_NM) IN(select MIDDLE_NM, SMALL_NM from prod_cate where MIDDLE_NO=#{middleNo} and PC.SMALL_NO=#{smallNo})
